CN.comment: List of 'Contract Identifier' of the result of a specific Result

CT.efx: {ND-Root, text:$vRES} ${/BT-721-Contract[(BT-721-Contract/@languageID is not empty) and (OPT-316-Contract == OPT-315-LotResult [BT-13713-LotResult == '$vRES'])]}
CT.comment: List of 'name of Contract' of the result of a specific result

Con_award_list.comment: Tendering Party ID Reference of a specific result

Con_award_names.efx: {ND-Root, text:$vTPA} ${/BT-500-Organization-Company[(BT-500-Organization-Company/@languageID is not empty) and (OPT-200-Organization-Company == OPT-300-Tenderer[OPT-210-Tenderer == '$vTPA'])]}

FA_contracts.comment: Contract Identifier Reference of a specific result

FA_indicator.comment: 'Contract Framework Agreement' of a specific contract

HO.comment: 'Tender Value Highest' of a specific result

LO.comment: 'Tender Value Lowest' of a specific result

NO.comment: 'Received Submissions Count' of a specific result

VC_Contract_ID.comment: 'Contract Identifier Reference' of a specific result

VC_Tender_value.comment: 'Tender Value' of a specific contract in a specific result

NoAward.comment: Result Lot Identifier'when no winner was chosen and the competition is closed
